mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_inisis_pay_hst ( appldate, applnum, appltime, authsignature, buyeremail, buyername, buyertel, card_applprice, card_bankcode, card_checkflag, card_clevent, card_code, card_corpflag, card_expire, card_gwcode, card_interest, card_membernum, card_num, card_point, card_prtc_code, card_prtccode, card_purchasecode, card_purchasename, card_quota, card_srccode, card_terminalnum, card_usepoint, currency, custemail, eventcode, flgnotisendchk, goodname, goodsname, mid, moid, orgprice, p_fn_nm, p_sub, p_subcnt, parentemail, paydevice, paymethod, resultcode, resultmsg, tid, totprice, gen_by, gen_dt ) values ( #{applDate}, #{applNum}, #{applTime}, #{authSignature}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerTel}, #{CARD_ApplPrice}, #{CARD_BankCode}, #{CARD_CheckFlag}, #{CARD_ClEvent}, #{CARD_Code}, #{CARD_CorpFlag}, #{CARD_Expire}, #{CARD_GWCode}, #{CARD_Interest}, #{CARD_MemberNum}, #{CARD_Num}, #{CARD_Point}, #{CARD_PRTC_CODE}, #{CARD_PrtcCode}, #{CARD_PurchaseCode}, #{CARD_PurchaseName}, #{CARD_Quota}, #{CARD_SrcCode}, #{CARD_TerminalNum}, #{CARD_UsePoint}, #{currency}, #{custEmail}, #{EventCode}, #{FlgNotiSendChk}, #{goodName}, #{goodsName}, #{mid}, #{MOID}, #{OrgPrice}, #{P_FN_NM}, #{p_Sub}, #{p_SubCnt}, #{parentEmail}, #{payDevice}, #{payMethod}, #{resultCode}, #{resultMsg}, #{tid}, #{TotPrice}, 'admin', now() )
